mapper.insert: insert into t_activities( name, col_id, publish_time, date_time, end_date, location, aim, content, activity_type, duration, act_object, number, contact, phone, assist, status ) values(#{name}, #{college.id}, #{publishTime}, #{dateTime}, #{endDate}, #{location}, #{aim}, #{content}, #{actType.id}, #{duration}, #{actObject}, #{number}, #{contact}, #{phone}, #{assist}, #{status} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_activities act where act.status = #{status}

select act.id act_id, act.name act_name, act.publish_time, act.date_time, act.end_date, act.location, act.aim, act.content, act.duration, act.act_object, act.number, act.contact, act.phone, act.assist, act.status, col.id col_id, col.name col_name, a_type.id a_type_id, a_type.name a_type_name from t_activities act inner join t_colleges col on act.col_id=col.id inner join t_activity_type a_type on act.activity_type=a_type.id limit #{pageOffset}, #{pageSize};

select act.id act_id, act.name act_name, act.publish_time, act.date_time, act.end_date, act.location, act.aim, act.content, act.duration, act.act_object, act.number, act.contact, act.phone, act.assist, act.status, col.id col_id, col.name col_name, a_type.id a_type_id, a_type.name a_type_name from t_activities act inner join t_colleges col on act.col_id=col.id inner join t_activity_type a_type on act.activity_type=a_type.id order by act.publish_time desc limit #{pageOffset}, #{pageSize};

select act.id act_id, act.name act_name, act.publish_time, act.date_time, act.end_date, act.location, act.aim, act.content, act.duration, act.act_object, act.number, act.contact, act.phone, act.assist, act.status, col.id col_id, col.name col_name, a_type.id a_type_id, a_type.name a_type_name from t_activities act inner join t_colleges col on act.col_id=col.id inner join t_activity_type a_type on act.activity_type=a_type.id where act.col_id = #{college.id} order by act.publish_time desc limit #{pager.pageOffset}, #{pager.pageSize};
select count(*) from t_activities act where act.col_id = #{id};

select act.id act_id, act.name act_name, act.publish_time, act.date_time, act.end_date, act.location, act.aim, act.content, act.duration, act.act_object, act.number, act.contact, act.phone, act.assist, act.status, act.reason, col.id col_id, col.name col_name, a_type.id a_type_id, a_type.name a_type_name from t_activities act inner join t_colleges col on act.col_id=col.id inner join t_activity_type a_type on act.activity_type=a_type.id where act.id=#{id};
select act.end_date from t_activities act where act.id = #{actId}
